website_summaries.verdict: A budget-friendly receiver by a top-selling brand that may not impress audiophiles, but has useful capabilities for a low price.
pros: Although this receiver is very affordable, it offers Bluetooth connectivity that's simple to set up
Has a straightforward design with functions and a remote that are easy to use
Vinyl fans love how simple it is to use with turntables
cons: Doesn't have a lot of bells and whistles, and the sound isn't as powerful as what you get from pricier models

customer_reviews.title: What I have been looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Stereo meets my expectation in a Sony product. The Bluetooth function works great. The system has plenty of volume for me. The remote is great. I don't need to spend a lot of money for a quality stereo system.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed for my new turntable. I had previously bought the Rockville Blutube, and it didn't work with my turntable. I was super excited that this receiver had a phono input that works with the moving magnet on my cartridge. Simple and awesome, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Moreland

customer_reviews.title: just what i wanted
customer_reviews.text: simple. Connects to turntable without a preamp. I can also connect via bluetooth to stream music. Exactly what I wanted and was advertised.
customer_reviews.author: matthewB

customer_reviews.title: Great for my turntable set up
customer_reviews.text: This is a my intro into the hi fi world, they power my R51s decently and drive my turntable for a great listening experience!
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Gift for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: I like that the price was reasonable. My daughter tells me that it sounds great. That's all I need to know. If she's happy, I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: ohenry

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this to hook my turntable up to and I’m very impressed with everything about it. I honestly didn’t even notice it had Bluetooth so that was a wonderful surprise. Worth ever penny.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Crenshaw

customer_reviews.title: Clear sound and easy Bluetooth connect
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was needing a receiver for her new record player. It was perfect! It sounds so clear and vibrant and it was easy to Bluetooth connect!
customer_reviews.author: Texas customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality Sound
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Receiver. I love the Bluetooth feature. Very simple System. Easy to hook up. Great loud sound. 200W. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Metalstormfan

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: This receiver was purchased to replace a 30 year old Sony 2-channel receiver but did not match the sound quality of the old unit. Functioned properly but sound quality was lacking.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hoard

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't have all the bells and whistles so make sure it has right connections.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup and put in place. Took all of 5 minutes tops.
customer_reviews.author: Cortney Whiting

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup and good sound quality. Good remote. Needs a better antenna.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the product. Did exactly what I needed it to!
customer_reviews.author: AUSTIN TRUETT

customer_reviews.title: Simple and stylish.
customer_reviews.text: I’m by no means an audio gizmo expert/snob. I don’t need to rattle the windows with volume. I just want to hear what I’m listening to at the moment. This package works and looks great. Easy setup with a CD player and a turntable. Haven’t used the Bluetooth, but always a nice option to have if I need it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric M

customer_reviews.title: It's a great item that works well without paying a fortune
customer_reviews.text: Easy hookup and sounds great... I purchased it for my family room
customer_reviews.author: Gilly

customer_reviews.title: Speakers
customer_reviews.text: The speakers you can't play loud otherwise the protection lights up on the stereo and it shuts off the system. Then you have to start again
customer_reviews.author: Samuel R.

customer_reviews.title: Good system with nice features for a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to connect and get working and a reasonably good sound
customer_reviews.author: E. David Shaw

product_meta.title: Sony STRDH190 2-ch Stereo Receiver with Phono Inputs & Bluetooth with 100ft of Speaker Wire and 5 Pairs of Banana Plugs
product_meta.description:
Size:STRDH190 Receiver Only Bundle

The Stereo Receiver brings together your vinyl and digital music. The perfect match for the PS-HX500 or PS-LX300USB turntables, you can switch effortlessly between analog and digital with simple Bluetooth connectivity and connect to all your equipment. With its low-profile design (5 ¼” tall), the receiver fits easily into any conventional AV cabinet.

Smarter Bluetooth Connectivity

Not only can you connect to the stereo through Bluetooth and play all your favorite tracks, but with Bluetooth Standby, you can turn your receiver on straight from your paired smartphone or tablet.

Connect All Your Equipment

The stereo has four analog audio inputs and one output, for easy connection to your audio recording device and other audio equipment.

Exceptional Listening Experience

Enjoy the subtlest nuances of studio-quality sound in higher than CD quality with High-Resolution Audio. Sound-matched to PS-HX500 and PS-LX300USB turntables, pair your receiver with either the PS-HX500 or PS-LX300USB to get optimal sound from your vinyl. 

Features

Plug your turntable into your receiver via the phono input for appropriate pre-amplification and EQ. The receiver has four analog audio inputs and one output, for easy connection to your audio recording device and other audio equipment. There is an FM tuner with 30 digital presets with station names, as well as auto tuning. The best part of it all, the stereo’s A+B function lets you connect two sets of front speakers. 

Bundle Includes:

 * Sony 2 Channel Stereo Receiver with Phono Inputs and Bluetooth Connectivity
 * Monoprice High Quality 24K Gold-Plated Speaker Banana Plugs, Closed Screw Type (5-Pair)
 * Monoprice Select Series 16AWG Speaker Wire, 100 Feet
feature_bullets: 2-CH STEREO RECEIVER: The Stereo Receiver brings together your vinyl and digital music. You can switch effortlessly between analog and digital with simple Bluetooth connectivity and connect to all your equipment.

SMART CONNECTIVITY: Not only can you connect to the stereo through Bluetooth and play all your favorite tracks, but with Bluetooth Standby, you can turn your receiver on straight from your paired smartphone or tablet.
CONNECT ALL EQUIPMENT: The stereo has four analog audio inputs and one output, for easy connection to your audio recording device and other audio equipment.

QUALITY LISTENING EXPERIENCE: Enjoy the subtlest nuances of studio-quality sound in higher than CD quality with High-Resolution Audio. Care and attention to the highest quality audio starts with the power transformer, that is why the stereo has a large capacity power transformer.

BUNDLE INCLUDES: Sony 2 Channel Stereo Receiver with Phono Inputs and Bluetooth Connectivity with Monoprice High Quality 24K Gold-Plated Speaker Banana Plugs, Closed Screw Type (5-Pair) and Monoprice Select Series 16AWG Speaker Wire, 100 Feet
